snippet.title: Run x Gun  - Video Game Steam Trailer
snippet.description:
Steam Page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2673260/Run_x_Gun/

Description:

Run and gun while you shoot down hoards of alien space ships in a bullet hell shooter/endless runner. Upgrade you gun with various power ups and weapon types like rockets, grenades and lasers. And finally defeat menacing boss ships to save the world from the scourge of alien invaders.

Story:

Colonel Arthur McDouglas was finally enjoying some off time after retiring from the United States military. Suddenly he hears a message on the radio from the president of the United States that says the country is being attacked by an alien invasion force. So the Colonel grabs his rifle and a few energy bars to take on alien invasion force himself.
